title: Between the Scenes - Trevor's First Oscars Experience
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Trevor's First Oscars Experience
description:
Trevor talks about attending his first Oscars after-party alongside Jennifer Lopez and describes his awkward encounter with Beyonce.
